function NPC_102111:Init(NPCID) --[[ 1: Pain 누적 데미지 --]] NPC_ReserveUserData(NPCID, 2)
NPC_102111.LimitForBreakTail = NPC_102111.MaxHP/10 NPC_102111.LimitForPain = NPC_102111.MaxHP/20
NPC_102111.TalIdThreat = 210211107 NPC_102111.TalIdPain1 = 210211109 NPC_102111.TalIdPain2 = 210211110 NPC_102111.TalIdAssultCall = 210211113
NPC_102111.MinionId = 102112 NPC_102111.BufIdSacrifice = 40190 NPC_102111.BufIdRedEye = 40191 end
function NPC_102111:OnSpawn( Info ) this:GainBuff( NPC_102111.BufIdRedEye ) end
-- 복제의 춤 function NPC_102111:CopyDance( ThisNPC, Enemy ) -- Summon minion
if ThisNPC:GetSummonCount() < 2 then local Minion = ThisNPC:SummonNow( NPC_102111.MinionId, ThisNPC:GetPos() ) Minion:Assist(ThisNPC) ThisNPC:Aggro( "random", 0 ) end
-- Do reaction ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_102111.TalIdPain1 ) end
function NPC_102111:AccDamage( bHead, HitInfo ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( HitInfo.Victim ) local totalDamage = 0 local currentDamage = 0 local currentTalent = ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent()
totalDamage = ThisNPC:GetUserData(1) + HitInfo.Damage ThisNPC:SetUserData(1, totalDamage)
--GLog( "T:" .. totalDamage .. "\n" ) if totalDamage > NPC_102111.LimitForPain then if not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_102111.TalIdPain1 ) then NPC_102111:CopyDance( ThisNPC, HitInfo.Attacker )
ThisNPC:SetUserData(1, 0) end end
return HitInfo end
-- 머리 히트 function NPC_102111:OnHitCapsule_1_0( HitInfo ) return NPC_102111:AccDamage( true, HitInfo ) end
-- 머리 히트 function NPC_102111:OnHitCapsule_2_0( HitInfo ) return NPC_102111:AccDamage( true, HitInfo ) end
-- 꼬리 히트 function NPC_102111:OnHitCapsule_2_2( HitInfo ) return NPC_102111:AccDamage( false, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_102111:OnVictory( ) local MinionCnt = this:GetUserData( 2 ) --GLog( MinionCnt .. "\n" )
for i=1,MinionCnt do this:GainBuff( NPC_102111.BufIdSacrifice ) --GLog( NPC_102111.BufIdSacrifice .. " " ) end
this:SetUserData( 1, 0 ) this:SetUserData( 2, 0 ) end
function NPC_102111:AssultCall( ThisNPC, Enemy ) ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_102111.TalIdAssultCall ) end
-- 아무나 찍어서 한놈 점사하도록 명령 function NPC_102111:OnFinishAssultCall( ThisNPC, Enemy ) --[[ local MinionCnt = AsNPC(ThisNPC):GetSummonCount() for i=1,MinionCnt do Minion = AsNPC(ThisNPC):GetMinion(i) Minion:Attack( Enemy ) end --]] end
